title: Sampler, 1801–50
medium:
Medium: linen and silk on linen
Technique: cross and eye stitches on plain weave foundation. Counted stitches.
provenance: Ex. coll. Fraser-Martin. Purchsed through Mrs. Wiltbank, 1924.
creditline: Gift of Anonymous Donor from the Fraser/Martin Collection
description: Zigzag border enclosing three alphabets and various practice letters with assorted motifs dominated by a ship at the bottom.
